Remote Can Be Pressed 100,000 Times = (100,000 photos). Remote Standby Time Is 3-5 Years. Remote Mounts In Handle (Competition's Remote Does Not Mount, Competition's Remote Is Easy To Lose)
BUILT IN TRIPOD: Extend Non Skid Feet For A Standalone Selfie Stick. Safe And Reliable. 100% Genuine Aluminum Stick & Legs, Easy To Carry.
TWO GIFTS IN ONE, FOR ALL AGES: Selfie Stick And Tripod For The Same Price. Friendly Customer Service From Houston,Tx Since 2006.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought many selfie sticks that I ended up throwing away, and this one is the best by far; the price is excellent for the quality. It's very sturdy and comes with a carry-on bag that is very convenient for carrying around. The Bluetooth remote was easy to connect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Love it
reviews.reviewText: Impression: I wasn't expecting this to be a professional tool that would last me for several years (it isn't LOL), but it's surprised me how durable it is. It's it's horribly cheap or flimsy like I half expected. Been about 1.5 years now and it still works perfect. It hasn't broken yet at least LOLQuality: Decent. Material isn't super great quality but it isn't terrible flimsy plastic. Parts are reasonably thick enough to provide adequate support for my phone. Don't try a DSLR, it'll probably collapse it. Digital cameras may be iffy depending on the weight. Legs are thick enough to provide stability when placing the phone on it.Stability: Indoors, it's great. Doesn't move until you move it, very portable and light weight but still works as intended. Outdoors, I can see potentially how it can fail if a very strong wind blows and it may collapse. Especially if you expand it to its full height. More resistance to the wind, and not enough resistance at the base. Recommended to put something to hold down the base if you're going to do any outdoor photography and use this as a tripod.Portability: Very light, easy to expand and retract. I put it away after very use, and it's very easy to pull it back out and set it up againHeight: It was actually taller than I expected. Description does say it goes to 4ft, but I wasn't actually expecting it to be capable of doing it. When I first purchased online, I thought beyond 3ft, the stick would be too thin and the whole thing would break or collapse if I tried to max it out. BUT IT WORKED. I've been usually using it at max height for all my shoots and it works fine.Things I liked: I actually really liked the snap buttons that locked the height increases. Easy to use, no hassle with trying to turn buttons or knobs.Price: Decent for the quality I gotWord of advice: Don't buy if you're expecting professional industry quality tripod. Go to a camera store for that, seriously. For the average user, this works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and functional.
reviews.reviewText: An excellent value for what you pay, but not really sturdy enough for using at multiple locations or alot of travel.I use these daily to mount my cell phones for use as webcams and to take product shots. They're relatively easy to get a phone as large as an s22 ultra with a thick protective case on it in and out of the mount. It extends easily and you can get it to hold position fairly well.I didn't find the remote particularly useful, but I don't have much use for it, so I'm neutral on it's capability. They're not overlly sturdy, so I wouldn't recommend them for a heavier camera, or for lots of travel with set up and break down, but they're great for simple use and an excellent value when you don't want to spend the money, or have a need, for the far more expensive options on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Tripod Selfie Stick
reviews.reviewText: This was such a great buy and I was very happy with this selfie stick. You can set the height you prefer on the tripod or holding the selfie stick. It also has a remote to start and stop videos and do picture capture. The only thing is you have to connect your Bluetooth everytime you use the remote. You get a carry bag so that it's easy to carry you tripod selfie stick. Very good value for the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for taking pictures
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this tripod, and it has quickly become my go-to accessory for capturing moments on the go! The versatility of transitioning it into a selfie stick is incredibly convenient. The build quality is robust, ensuring stability whether I'm taking photos or recording videos.One feature that truly stands out is the integrated camera clicker. It's seamless to use, allowing me to snap photos or start recordings without needing to set a timer or ask someone else for assistance. The tripod's adjustability and easy setup make it a breeze to position for the perfect shot.In summary, this product has exceeded my expectations. Its multifunctionality, combined with its reliability, makes it an essential tool for anyone looking to elevate their photography or videography game. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stick is awesome. I had no problems at all with it so far and it's simple to use. I don't care if people don't use these much anymore. This one makes it so convenient to take great photos and make memories. I plan on buying more for gifts because it is a great product and priced right. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It is a tripod, not a selfie stick
reviews.reviewText: You cannot hold it as a selfie stick, the tripod legs stick out. It is sturdy tripod though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and versatile for a fun way to photograph your travel experience
reviews.reviewText: This selfie stick tripod comes with an easy-to-carry case so that is available when you want or need it. The clamp is sturdy that holds your phone while you use it. You can mount your smartphone in two different ways to achieve the images desired. The bonus is that it also adapts to a regular camera. The detachable remote is easy to connect to your device via Bluetooth and works very well. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Precio calidad el mejor del mercado
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto, yo tenía una versión anterior pero después de 5 años y varios viajes dio lo que tenía que dar aun lo uso para cosas básicas, motivo por el cual decidí adquirir este nuevo.Como punto negativo al de la versión anterior es que su shooter no es de carga usb sino de pilas 🔋A favor son la mejora de materiales reducción de tuercas por mecanismos de presión y menor peso.Compra recomendable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality, but no spot to attach remote.
reviews.reviewText: I owned a 51” version and loved it. I decided to go for 61” as I gave the other away. For my surprise this version has not a solid base to attach the remote to the selfie stick and makes the remote susceptible to be lost. Also remote does not have a hole or anything to tie a string or anything. I’m worried I will lose it rather quickly and won’t be able to use it anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: This is a brilliant, portable tripod.
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I live in a very windy area and the tripod legs weren't that stable on a windy day! But it's so light and easy to assemble it is an absolute must for travelling.
Nice tripod and remote control good work

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for taking pics by yourself
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for you to take pics by yourself.Not so heavy to carry around.Tripod height is good. N very easy to contact the seller very kind response.
